update(E, EntityMapper<E>, String) - Method in class com.audioord.dao.BaseEntityDao
Allows to update(create) raw from database using inputEntity object, input EntityMapper and SQL query string also it checks input Entity and EntityMapper to null updateMethod gets connection from ConnectionSource.getConnection(), creates PreparedStatement calls EntityMapper.write(PreparedStatement, Entity), which fills PreparedStatement with params of Entity execution of statement returns number of affected rows if it was affected at least one row, it's returns true,otherwise false
